headline.main: 400 Die in Naples Arsenal Blast; Witnesses Call Port a Shambles; 400 DIE IN NAPLES IN ARMS EXPLOSION

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, March 31 -- At least 400 persons were killed outright and more than 2,000 seriously injured shortly after noon on Sunday when an ammunition dump in the port area of Naples blew up, flattening buildings in a wide sector, according to private information received here tonight.
abstract: Naples ammunition dump blast linked to possible sowing of delayed-action bombs during US air raid or work of US-Brit parachutists
